title: LF Main Roster Jg and Sub Jg for New Iron-Plat Team (Gold/Plat)
body:
We are looking for Gold or Plat Junglers who are open to learning, to join our team for iron-plat tournaments. We would prefer if you had:
- 10 hours of free time a week for practice (Mainly solo/duo q)
- Discord and a working mic
- Open to learn new champs and are willing to put in time to practice

*Need Gold or Plat this season with 20+ solo/duo games played

If this sounds like you and you are interested in joining, please add me and msg me telling me if you want to try for main roster or sub, showing me your op.gg.
Thank you for considering,
DramaticChicken
